name: Nimblewright
languages: understands one language known to its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The nimblewright has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The nimblewright's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Repairable
entries: As long as it has at least 1 hit point remaining, the nimblewright regains 1 hit point when a {@spell mending} spell is cast on it.

traits.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The nimblewright has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it {@condition prone}.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The nimblewright makes three attacks: two with its rapier and one with its dagger.

actions.name: Rapier
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dagger
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4 damage) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4 damage) piercing damage.
